original_title: Sri Lanka Chamber of Small and Medium Industries hails President AKD
original_body_lines: The President and the members of Sri Lanka Chamber of Small and Medium Industries has extended their warm and heartfelt congratulations to President Anura Kumara Dissanayake on being elected as the 9th Executive President of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka.

“Your election by the decisive mandate reflects the trust and confidence placed in your leadership and we appreciate very much the challenge taken up by you at this crucial juncture to resolve the present economic, social crisis encountered in our motherland Sri Lanka,”  Sri Lanka Chamber of Small and Medium Industries President Prof. Rohan De Silva said.

“We, at the Sri Lanka Chamber of Small and Medium Industries recognise you as a leader who always advocates the policy of developing the local industry for self-sufficiency, stability, cutting down on waste of funds and resources, sustenance of the economy and the security of citizens of all races and religions. We also wish that all leaders of other political parties, Government Officials and staff rally round you to save our country from the present turmoil. We look forward to extending our fullest co-operation and support in all your efforts and actions in reaching, prosperity, sustenance, and peace to the peoples of our nation,” said the congratulatory letter from Prof. de Silva to President Dissanayake.
